tool_description: Analyzes image quality using automated metrics including sharpness, brightness, contrast, and composition scoring.

asset_id.description: Asset identifier of the image to assess

assessment_type.description: Type of assessment: technical, aesthetic, or comprehensive

error_messages: Asset not found: The specified asset_id does not exist.
Invalid asset type: Asset must be an image file for quality assessment.
Invalid assessment type: assessment_type must be one of [technical, aesthetic, comprehensive].
Assessment failed: Image quality could not be analyzed - check file format and integrity.
usage: Provide the asset ID of an image. Choose assessment type based on whether you need technical metrics, aesthetic scoring, or both.

suitable_for_web.description: Whether image meets web display quality standards
